name: Nanchara-slider
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin to create text and image slider. Compatible with jqMobi and Zepto.
body:
Nanchara slider plugin ================= A simple jQuery plugin to create text and image slider. Compatible with jqMobi and Zepto. Example --------------------- ### HTML Snippet ###### ```html
Text 1
Text 2
Text 3
``` ### Javascript ###### ```javascript $("#slide_bar").nancharaSlider(); ``` ### CSS ###### ```css #slide_bar { background-color: #ddd; height: 30px; width: 320px; } #slide_bar .ns_content { line-height: 30px; text-align: center; width: 320px; } ``` Options ---------------------
OptionDescriptionDefault
accelAcceleration of the slide animation1
remainTimeMillisecond to stop the frame at center2000
nextTimeMillisecond to move the slider to next frame400
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
